row.name: JOBI.FT_HG_REPLACE_SRC
row.description: Ersetzen des HOST Attributes fuer die Transfer-Quelle

row.process:
:SET &HOST# = GET_ATT(FT_SRC_HOST) :SET &HND# = PREP_PROCESS_AGENTGROUP("HG.SOURCE",,,) :PROCESS &HND# : SET &HOST# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#,1) : SET &STATUS# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#,2) :ENDPROCESS :CLOSE_PROCESS &HND#
:SET &OLD_EXEC# = GET_ATT(FT_SRC_HOST) :PUT_ATT FT_SRC_HOST = &HOST# :PRINT "FT_SRC_HOST: Old: &OLD_EXEC# replaced with: &HOST#"
